mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TIME_TABLE
SELECT * FROM PLAY WHERE PLAY_START <= TO_DATE(#{playEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND PLAY_END >= TO_DATE(#{playStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND SCREEN_NO = #{screenNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLAY(PLAY_NO, MOVIE_NO, SCREEN_NO, PLAY_START, PLAY_END, PLAY_REGDATE) VALUES(SEQ_PLAY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{movieNo}, #{screenNo}, TO_DATE(#{playStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{playEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_ST = 'Y' ORDER BY MOVIE_TITLE ASC
SELECT * FROM MOVIE m WHERE m.MOVIE_ST = 'Y' ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(b.MOVIE_NO)*100 FROM BOOK b WHERE b.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO AND b.BOOK_ST = 'Y') DESC, m.MOVIE_TITLE ASC

SELECT (SELECT ROUND(SUM(r.REV_LIKE) / COUNT(r.REV_LIKE) ,1) FROM REVIEW r WHERE r.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO AND r.REV_ST = 'N') AS "평점" FROM MOVIE m LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW r ON m.MOVIE_NO = r.MOVIE_NO WHERE m.MOVIE_ST = 'Y' GROUP BY m.MOVIE_NO, m.MOVIE_TITLE ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(b.MOVIE_NO)*100 FROM Book b WHERE b.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO AND b.BOOK_ST = 'Y') DESC, m.MOVIE_TITLE ASC

SELECT ROUND((SELECT COUNT(b.MOVIE_NO)*100 FROM Book b WHERE b.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO AND b.BOOK_ST = 'Y') / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_ST = 'Y'), 1) AS "예매율" FROM MOVIE m LEFT OUTER JOIN BOOK b ON m.MOVIE_NO = b.MOVIE_NO WHERE MOVIE_ST = 'Y' GROUP BY m.MOVIE_NO, m.MOVIE_TITLE ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(b.MOVIE_NO)*100 FROM Book b WHERE b.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO AND b.BOOK_ST = 'Y') DESC, m.MOVIE_TITLE ASC

SELECT m.MOVIE_NO, m.MOVIE_TITLE, m.MG_CONTENT, m.MOVIE_IMG1, c.CINEMA_NAME, s.SCREEN_NAME, s.SCREEN_SEAT, s.SCREEN_STYLE, p.PLAY_NO, p.PLAY_START, p.PLAY_END, p.PLAY_BOOKCOUNT FROM PLAY p INNER JOIN SCREEN s ON p.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO INNER JOIN CINEMA c ON s.CINEMA_NAME = c.CINEMA_NAME INNER JOIN MOVIE m ON p.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO WHERE c.CINEMA_NO = #{cinemaNo} AND TO_CHAR(p.PLAY_START, 'YYYYMMDD') = #{strDate} AND p.PLAY_START > SYSDATE ORDER BY m.MOVIE_TITLE ASC, p.PLAY_START ASC

SELECT m.MOVIE_NO, m.MOVIE_TITLE, m.MG_CONTENT, m.MOVIE_IMG1, c.CINEMA_NAME, s.SCREEN_NAME, s.SCREEN_SEAT, s.SCREEN_STYLE, p.PLAY_NO, p.PLAY_START, p.PLAY_END, p.PLAY_BOOKCOUNT FROM PLAY p INNER JOIN SCREEN s ON p.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO INNER JOIN CINEMA c ON s.CINEMA_NAME = c.CINEMA_NAME INNER JOIN MOVIE m ON p.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO WHERE c.CINEMA_NO = #{cinemaNo} AND TO_CHAR(p.PLAY_START, 'YYYYMMDD') = #{strDate} AND p.PLAY_START > SYSDATE AND m.MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} ORDER BY p.PLAY_START ASC

SELECT m.MOVIE_NO, m.MOVIE_TITLE, m.MG_CONTENT, m.MOVIE_IMG1, c.CINEMA_NAME, s.SCREEN_NAME, s.SCREEN_SEAT, s.SCREEN_STYLE, p.PLAY_NO, p.PLAY_START, p.PLAY_END, p.PLAY_BOOKCOUNT FROM PLAY p INNER JOIN SCREEN s ON p.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO INNER JOIN CINEMA c ON s.CINEMA_NAME = c.CINEMA_NAME INNER JOIN MOVIE m ON p.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO WHERE TO_CHAR(p.PLAY_START, 'YYYYMMDD') = #{strDate} AND p.PLAY_START > SYSDATE AND s.SCREEN_STYLE = #{screenStyle} AND s.CINEMA_NAME = #{cinemaName} ORDER BY m.MOVIE_TITLE ASC, p.PLAY_START ASC

SELECT m.MOVIE_NO, m.MOVIE_TITLE, m.MG_CONTENT, m.MOVIE_IMG1, c.CINEMA_NAME, s.SCREEN_NAME, s.SCREEN_SEAT, s.SCREEN_STYLE, p.PLAY_NO, p.PLAY_START, p.PLAY_END, p.PLAY_BOOKCOUNT FROM PLAY p INNER JOIN SCREEN s ON p.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO INNER JOIN CINEMA c ON s.CINEMA_NAME = c.CINEMA_NAME INNER JOIN MOVIE m ON p.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO WHERE TO_CHAR(p.PLAY_START, 'YYYYMMDD') = #{strDate} AND p.PLAY_START > SYSDATE AND s.SCREEN_STYLE = #{screenStyle} AND s.CINEMA_NAME = #{cinemaName} AND m.MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} ORDER BY p.PLAY_START ASC
SELECT * FROM PLAY p INNER JOIN SCREEN s ON p.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO INNER JOIN CINEMA c ON s.CINEMA_NAME = c.CINEMA_NAME INNER JOIN MOVIE m ON p.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO WHERE p.PLAY_NO = #{playNo}

SELECT
(s.SCREEN_NAME) AS PLAY_UPLOADER
, ( SELECT TO_CHAR(MIN(p.PLAY_START), 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM PLAY p WHERE s.SCREEN_NO = p.SCREEN_NO AND s.SCREEN_NO = #{screenNo} AND p.PLAY_START > SYSDATE ) AS PLAY_START
, ( SELECT TO_CHAR(MIN(p.PLAY_START), 'HH24:MI') FROM PLAY p WHERE s.SCREEN_NO = p.SCREEN_NO AND s.SCREEN_NO = #{screenNo} AND p.PLAY_START > SYSDATE ) AS PLAY_BOOKSEAT
, ( SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(p.PLAY_START), 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM PLAY p WHERE s.SCREEN_NO = p.SCREEN_NO AND s.SCREEN_NO = #{screenNo} AND p.PLAY_START > SYSDATE ) AS PLAY_END
, ( SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(p.PLAY_START), 'HH24:MI') FROM PLAY p WHERE s.SCREEN_NO = p.SCREEN_NO AND s.SCREEN_NO = #{screenNo} AND p.PLAY_START > SYSDATE ) AS PLAY_REGDATE FROM SCREEN s WHERE s.SCREEN_NO = #{screenNo}
